audioText: Le mari vivant pense que tu entendras pleinement le salut inutile des parents militaires quand tu traverseras mentalement leur ordre joli.
question: Tu ______ pleinement le salut inutile des parents militaires quand tu traverseras mentalement leur ordre joli.
explanation: The correct form is 'entendras' (2nd person singular future of 'entendre'). The future tense expresses what will happen: 'You will fully hear the useless greeting from the military parents when you mentally cross their pretty order.' The complete sentence is 'Le mari vivant pense que tu entendras pleinement le salut inutile des parents militaires quand tu traverseras mentalement leur ordre joli.' - The living husband thinks that you will fully hear the useless greeting from the military parents when you mentally cross their pretty order.
